excerpt: "Tech giants and healthcare software companies have developed more voice-enabled features in recent years to make clinical workflows more efficient and bring greater convenience to at-home care. Below are eight recent voice technology developments in healthcare announced in the last three months: Amazon launched a feature for its Alexa voice assistant that lets users search for places to get a COVID-19 test."
